## Overview
Made custom world and model in Gazebo
AUV simulated actions matched real world observations

## Key Features {.unnumbered}

::: {layout-ncol="2"}

::: {.card .p-3}
**Real-time Force Visualization**
Reports forces acting on individual AUV components as they happen.
:::

::: {.card .p-3}
**High-Fidelity Physics**
Accurate buoyancy physics and correctly modeled fins and motors.
:::

::: {.card .p-3}
**Advanced Telemetry**
Compatible with QGroundControl and capable of tracking world position.
:::

::: {.card .p-3}
**Hardware Mirroring**
Equipped with the same sensor suite as the physical AUV.
:::

:::
